response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,000,000 to you, and I believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its unique features and the high demand for such items, I am extending this offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

This is a limited-time offer, and I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me. I am confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
